intro.p: Defines that an action is accessible through AJAX calls, so Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.AjaxHelper can generate a JavaScript proxy for it.

section.title: AjaxActionAttribute()
section.p: Method marked with this attribute will be accessible through AJAX calls, and Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.AjaxHelper will be able to generate a JavaScript proxy for them.

section.title: AjaxActionAttribute(String name)
section.p: Method marked with this attribute will be accessible through AJAX calls, and Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.AjaxHelper will be able to generate a JavaScript proxy for them.

tr.td: A name for the action, on the JavaScript proxy. Useful when dealing with overloaded Ajax actions, as JavaScript does not support function overloading.
